openapi: 3.0.1

# *******************************************************************

info:
  title: Company API
  description: ALPS document for BigCo Company API
  version: 1.0.0

servers:
- url: 'http://api.example.org/company'

paths:
  /home:
    get:
      summary: 'home'
      operationId: home
      responses:
        200:
          description: home
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/company'
  /listCompanies:
    get:
      summary: 'listCompanies'
      operationId: listCompanies
      responses:
        200:
          description: listCompanies
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/company'
  /filterCompanies:
    get:
      summary: 'filterCompanies'
      operationId: filterCompanies
      responses:
        200:
          description: filterCompanies
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/company'
  /readCompany:
    get:
      summary: 'readCompany'
      operationId: readCompany
      responses:
        200:
          description: readCompany
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/company'
  /createCompany:
    post:
      summary: 'createCompany'
      operationId: createCompany
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/company'
      responses:
        200:
          description: add createCompany
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/company'
  /updateCompany:
    put:
      summary: 'updateCompany'
      operationId: updateCompany
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/company'
      responses:
        200:
          description: add updateCompany
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/company'
  /removeCompany/{id}:
    delete:
      summary: 'removeCompany'
      operationId: removeCompany
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: id of removeCompany
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        204:
          description: delete removeCompany

components:
  schemas:
    company:
      description: company item
      type: object
      properties:
          id:
            type: string
            example: 3341
          status:
            type: string
            example: 7yebun913rd70dieg45fvc
          legalName:
            type: string
            example: f03xrrnh9rsh86ukqrsp3
          streetAddress:
            type: string
            example: 6a915xczk36wl0a5o6kdz
          locality:
            type: string
            example: cbtbnpq8uef8hfzsaw4q8p
          addressRegion:
            type: string
            example: 416pil1mqst8ytzx2z8lhf
          postalCode:
            type: string
            example: qffan6iz8pior0dmy7f9c
          accressCountry:
            type: string
            example: 3d3mnce0p2fp6gk81jf67l
          telephone:
            type: string
            example: eo9bj45qremx6tlqyo0iis
          email:
            type: string
            example: 6zknvhxlibodscma25ievg
          dateCreated:
            type: string
            example: yrr9ghno4t9zt9y20m3doj
          dateUpdated:
            type: string
            example: lmof4n2ou7rhbg1it3vec
